column2: printer=[http://www.printedword.co.uk/ The Printed Word], Horsham, UK

column1: '''''Mallorn'' 44''' is the forty-fourth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s annual (as it was then) journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)

Mallorn 44 was the last issue to be published under the more academic format before the journal was revamped by the new editor, [[Henry Gee]]; as a result of the change of editor and format, [[Mallorn 45]] wasn't published until Spring [[2008]], over 18 months later.
* "In the Shadow of the Tree: A study of the motif of the [[White Tree of Gondor
column2: White Tree]] in the context of [[J.R.R. Tolkien
